messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Smarter Things About Homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... My mom was the founding president of a local group called parents against drug and alcohol abuse-PADAA when I was a teenager.  While she was busy at her
messages.messageBody:
SandraDodd@... wrote:

>
> In a message dated 6/2/05 8:33:38 AM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:
>
> <<
> Well, YOU just didn't LEARN, did you??? >>
>
> That was before they had the DARE program, though, which keeps all
> schoolkids
> off drugs.


My mom was the founding president of a local group called "parents
against drug and alcohol abuse-PADAA" when I was a teenager. While she
was busy at her PADAA meetings, I was getting high with my friends.

Jenny

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Smarter Things About Homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/2/05 8:33:38 AM, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/2/05 8:33:38 AM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<<
Well, YOU just didn't LEARN, did you??? >>

That was before they had the DARE program, though, which keeps all schoolkids
off drugs.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Smarter Things About Homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: SandraDodd@aol.com In a message dated 6/2/05 6:16:28 AM, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: SandraDodd@...

In a message dated 6/2/05 6:16:28 AM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<< Nonetheless she challenged my home
schooling saying my son would still miss out. "It's important for
him socially too. He needs to be offered drugs so he can turn them
down." >>

Hey, Holly turned down drugs just the week before last! And not at
school.
Both my boys have turned down drugs.

I, on the other hand, went to school and didn't turn them down.

Sandra

-=-=-=-

Well, YOU just didn't LEARN, did you???

~Kelly
